sentences.en: First and last , it is important to know oneself.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 人要有自知之明.

sentences.en: If one wants to learn it, one must do it oneself.
sentences.cn: 要想学会它就得亲自去做.

sentences.en: It is a very rewarding exercise to work this out oneself.
sentences.cn: 独自解决这个问题是一次受益匪浅的锻炼。

sentences.en: It is better to die oneself than to kill.
It is easy to persuade oneself.
It is not good to think only of oneself.
sentences.cn: 只为自己着想是不好的.

sentences.en: It is only through study that one really begins to know oneself.
sentences.cn: 只有通过学习，一个人才能真正了解自己。

sentences.en: It is valuable to know oneself.
It's so easy to feel sorry for oneself.
sentences.cn: 人很容易为自己感到委屈。

sentences.en: One has to ask oneself what the purpose of the exercise is.
sentences.cn: 大家必须问一问自己，这个锻炼的目的是什么。

sentences.en: One is firmly established by oneself.
One likes to do it oneself.
One must have a correct estimate of oneself.
sentences.cn: 对自己要有正确的估价.

sentences.en: Seeing a thing for oneself is better than hearing about it.
The doll-like figures in these stories are unlike anybody, let alone oneself.
sentences.cn: 这些故事中的玩偶形象跟谁都不像，更不用说像自己了。

sentences.en: When one dines in a restaurant, one likes a table to oneself.
sentences.cn: 人们在饭馆吃饭时, 喜欢独占一张桌子.

sentences.en: When working, one should concentrate and not allow oneself to be distracted.
sentences.cn: 工作时要集中精力,不要分心.
